name: The North Face Back-To-Berkeley Redux Remtlz Lux Boots - Men's
description:
Urban meets trail in these comfy boots that use premium materials and have a distinctly retro vibe. With their runner-like comfort and heritage styling, the Back-To-Berkeley Redux Remtlz Lux Boots have the kind of versatility that will keep them in rotation all year-round.Premium leather upper wears well and looks great.Reinforced rand protects the leather uppers where it is needed most.Padded collar comfortably supports the ankle.OrthoLite® Hybrid™ midsoles offer all-day comfort and uses 20% recycled materials.Textured triangular tread grabs onto the streets to keep you anchored.

        Sustainability
